metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32697 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: SQLite JDBC is a library for accessing and creating SQLite database filesin Java. Sqlite-jdbc addresses a remote code execution vulnerability viaJDBC URL. This issue impacting versions 3.6.14.1 through 3.41.2.1 and hasbeen fixed in version 3.41.2.2.

criterions.comment: xerial-sqlite-jdbc package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
